member.name: F:Miracle.FileZilla.Api.ProtocolVersions.Initial
member.summary: Initial protocol version supported Server version 0x00094300 - 0x00094700

member.name: F:Miracle.FileZilla.Api.ProtocolVersions.User16M
member.summary: First version supporting 16M users Server version 0x00094800 - 0x00095000

member.name: F:Miracle.FileZilla.Api.ProtocolVersions.TLS
member.summary: Protocol changes mostly related to TLS Server version 0x00095100 - 0x00095300

member.name: F:Miracle.FileZilla.Api.ProtocolVersions.Sha512
member.summary: User password with Sha512 hashing Server version 0x00095400 - 0x00095700

member.name: F:Miracle.FileZilla.Api.ProtocolVersions.UserControl24
member.summary: UserControl now has a 24 bit size Server version 0x00095800 - ?
